media:group.media:title: Collecting Video Games :: Introduction
media:group.media:description:
This video is intended as a springboard for a series looking at my video game collection for PS2/3/4, Vita and 3DS/DS, focusing on the issues, problems and strategies to be aware of if you're becoming serious about building a collection.

I've had numerous requests over the years from subscribers for me to "show" my collection.
Well, I always felt kind of embarrassed about doing that - in case it might look like "showing off". But now I feel I have found the right topic around which to organise showing games  from my collection: to exemplify and analyse the points I want to discuss! ðŸ˜ƒ

Background music is from the OST for Final Fantasy XIII.

Time Stamps:
00:00 Intro
02:25 Plushie Boguin
04:00 Tackling the Topic
05:00 Console Platforms I will cover
08:45 What/Who is a collector?
09:25 Investment Collector
12:00 Gamer Collector
13:05 Beachcombing
13:30 Example of a low-value treasure!
15:00 Gaming Collectibles
17:20 Collecting by game genre or series
19:40 Topics for Discussion - Collector Skills
23:00 FOMO
23:30 The Bread & Butter of Collecting
25:15 Collecting = Hard Work
26:00 Regional differences
27:50 Strategy Guides
29:03 wrap-up and good-byes

Various titles shown in this video are rated M (Mature 17+) by the ESRB.
My video is therefore NOT suitable for children as per the COPPA legislation.
